actions.name: Insert selected
actions.description: Insert selected suggestion

actions.name: Insert common prefix
actions.description: Insert shared prefix of available suggestions. Shake if there's no common prefix.

actions.name: Insert common prefix or navigate
actions.description: Insert shared prefix of available suggestions. Navigate if there's no common prefix.

actions.name: Insert common prefix or insert selected
actions.description: Insert shared prefix of available suggestions. Insert currently selected suggestion if there's not common prefix.

actions.name: Insert selected and execute
actions.description: Insert selected suggestion and then execute the current command.

actions.name: Execute
actions.description: Execute the current command.

actions.name: Hide autocomplete
actions.description: Hide the autocomplete window

actions.name: Show autocomplete
actions.description: Show the autocomplete window

actions.name: Toggle autocomplete
actions.description: Toggle the visibility of the autocomplete window

actions.name: Navigate up
actions.description: Scroll up one entry in the list of suggestions

actions.name: Navigate down
actions.description: Scroll down one entry in the list of suggestions

actions.name: Select 1st suggestion
actions.description: Select the 1st suggestion of the list

actions.name: Select 2nd suggestion
actions.description: Select the 2nd suggestion of the list

actions.name: Select 3rd suggestion
actions.description: Select the 3rd suggestion of the list

actions.name: Select 4th suggestion
actions.description: Select the 4th suggestion of the list

actions.name: Select 5th suggestion
actions.description: Select the 5th suggestion of the list

actions.name: Select 6th suggestion
actions.description: Select the 6th suggestion of the list

actions.name: Select 7th suggestion
actions.description: Select the 7th suggestion of the list

actions.name: Select 8th suggestion
actions.description: Select the 8th suggestion of the list

actions.name: Select 9th suggestion
actions.description: Select the 9th suggestion of the list

actions.name: Select 10th suggestion
actions.description: Select the 10th suggestion of the list

actions.name: Hide description popout
actions.description: Hide autocomplete description popout

actions.name: Show description popout
actions.description: Show autocomplete description popout

actions.name: Toggle description popout
actions.description: Toggle visibility of autocomplete description popout

actions.name: Toggle history mode
actions.description: Toggle between history suggestions and autocomplete spec suggestions

actions.name: Toggle fuzzy search
actions.description: Toggle between normal prefix search and fuzzy search

actions.name: Increase window size
actions.description: Increase the size of the autocomplete window

actions.name: Decrease window size
actions.description: Decrease the size of the autocomplete window
